jarvis_projects.description: Deployed a project to collect hardware specification and also monitor the cluster nodes resource usage in real time. The collected data will be stored in an RDBMS database for this we use posgres sql database. The data can help to manage reports for future resource planning purposes.

name: Hossein Sabouri

professional_experience.description: Developed multiple software application and worked on projects using Linux Bash, Docker and more. Agile/Scrum was used to collaborate with team.
professional_experience.title: QA Analyst

professional_experience.description: Analysed requirements and performed functional and regression tests based on developers instruction. Executed TCM to deploy new changes and created test cases for different scenarios. Delivered work using Agile (Kanban) methodologies, ensuring that all work was on track and met necessary deadlines.
professional_experience.title: QA Analyst

professional_experience.description: Combined visual elements from separated sources into single image by Nuke in Linux environment. Worked with software Nuke and Fusion, Conversion 2D image to 3D. Harvested Nuke script in order to extract the layer image elements
professional_experience.title: Image Compositor

summary: Using Nuke as a main software when I was working for visual effect companies for a couple of years attracted me to the computer science. I honed my computer skills by graduating from Concordia University with a Graduate Diploma in Computer Science degree. Gained my quality assurance analyst expertise by joining to Morgan & Stanley company which gave me the opportunity to hand-on experience working closely with full-stack features teams to deliver complete components for boarder platform integration and leveraged various technologies and tools, including LINUX, SQL, GIT Bitbuckets, Object Oriented Programming (OOP), and delivered work using Agile (Kanban) methodologies, analyzed requirement and performed functional and regression tests based on developer instruction.
